name: My Pals are Here! Primary 6 Books
description: Family of 5 people, cared for by a single mother who is a foreigner. There are 2 school-going children, both are non-Singaporean. They are both taking PSLE in 2023 but are unable to purchase school books. Mother is unable to work at the moment caring for the youngest child.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro
description: Client is Blind from birth and has acquired hearing loss. He works as a masseuse and has to support his wife and two young children below 2 years old. He requires the laptop to assist him with things like booking events as everything is getting increasingly digitalised

contact.org: The Singapore Association For The Deaf (SADeaf)
contact.name: Josiah Liu Yixuan

name: Laptop with Microsoft Word
description:
Client is a single father (with 2 young children) and is currently unemployed. He has great difficulties looking for a job, especially so that he does not have the appliances to update his resume on. His ex-wife has sold away all the electrical appliances leaving him not to have the practical resources to work on. He would greatly benefit to have a laptop with Word function.

Pls email or Whatsapp message to social worker Ms Hu (6950 6713) for more info. Thank you.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Edlin Hu

name: Laptop
description: A single mother of two teenage children staying in a rental flat requires a secondhand laptop for her 12 year old son who is going on to Secondary 1 next year. As her daughter does not have Singapore citizenship, the mother who works as a hawker assistant has been stretched with paying high fees for educational expenses. She has been experiencing job instability too due to the Covid pandemic.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Serene Koh

name: Laptop
description: Low-income family of 5 is seeking a secondhand laptop for family members to use for school assignments, job search and general purposes.

name: Used laptop
description: Client requires a laptop to attend classes. She was recently discharged from the hospital, and have not been gainfully employed for a few years. Hence, she's not able to purchase her own laptop.
